::Spears:;

She jumps out from behind the beam and runs down the hall.  She heads 
for the entrance of the Ark.  She heard the ship groan under the 
stress.  While running she mumbles,"Come on Ark, you can make it. If 
any of us can, you have to."  She kept running at full speed and 
headed for the entrance.
